Our Church

Our identity

we are disciples of christ a movement for wholness in a fragmented world. As part of the one body of christ, we welcome all to the lords rable as God has welcome

Our Vision

To be faithful, growing church that demonstrates true community. depp christian sprituality and passion for justice. Micah 6:8

Our mission

To be and to share the goos news of jesus christ, wirnessing, loving and serving from our doorsteps" to the ends of the earth Acts 1:8

Our confession

As member of the church, we congess that jesus is the christ, the son of the living God, as proclaimed him lord and savior of teh world.

About Us

we are a church that loves god
and his people

we have a strong scence of community with parishioners.
people and children of all ages here are engouraged to learn
about their own faith and the role of the church in our community
and worldwide
